product_name: Columbia Silver Ridge Stretch Short-Sleeve Shirt - Women's
long_description: The Silver Ridge Stretch short-sleeve shirt from Columbia brings superior comfort in the form of 2-way stretch and soft breathability. Silver Ridge stretch ripstop polyester with Omni-Dry(TM) moisture transferring technology moves and disperses sweat away from the body for quick evaporation and dry comfort. Features Omni-Shade(TM) sun protection; UPF 40 rating provides very good protection against harmful ultraviolet rays. Clever sun protection collar can be flipped up and secured with a button under the chin to help prevent sunburn on your neck. Breathable mesh lining and side and rear vents enhance airflow. Zippered chest pocket sits close to the front-button placket; interior pocket keeps small valuables close. Active, close-to-the-body fit.
short_description: The Silver Ridge Stretch short-sleeve shirt from Columbia brings superior comfort in the form of 2-way stretch and soft breathability.
